name: 陳匡正
objective:
本課程將探討：(1) 智財商業模式與智財交易；(2) 英美契約法；(3) 智財授權契約規範；(4) 授權程序與稽核；(5) 技術合作契約；(6) 智財合資契約及章程。事實上，本課程之進行，30% 以英文講授、70% 以中文講授，而且課堂教材以中文為主。

This course will illustrate the following issues: (1) IP Business Model and IP Transactions, (2) Anglo-American Contract Law, (3) Definition, Regulation, Types & Management of IP License, (4) License Agreement Auditing for Licensing Business, (5) Technical Cooperation Contract, (6) IP Joint Venture Contract and Articles of Association. In fact, the class lectures will be in English 30% and in Chinese 70%, and the class materials are mainly in Chinese.
